title: Sigabrt : Test common-api-rewriter3.xml causing sigabrt on genesis/b5_0 - linux-64-rh6genesis

samplequery:
Suspected XQuery : 

******************************************************************
 xquery version '1.0-ml';

        let $url := "http://localhost:7007/rewriter3.xqy"
        let $options :=
          <options xmlns="xdmp:http">
            <authentication method="digest">
              <username>admin</username>
              <password>admin</password>
            </authentication>
            <headers>
              <uri>/path/to/thing</uri>
              <match>^/(.*)$</match>
            </headers>
          </options>

        return
        xdmp:http-get($url, $options)/text()
******************************************************************

changeHistory.comment:
Raghu,
Here is another abort in QA test caused by timeout.
Please verify if nightly has seen it in recent past
This sigabrt is no more producible , verified on build : 20130116. Hence closing it.
